Interface BookingDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookingDAOImpl
public interface BookingDAO
Data Access Object interface for managing booking-related persistent data. Handles the creation, retrieval, and cancellation of customer gym bookings.
Author:
team IOTA

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    addBooking(Booking booking)
    Persists a new booking in the system.
    boolean
    deleteBooking(int bookingId)
    Deletes a booking record from the system.
    Booking
    getBookingById(int bookingId)
    Retrieves a booking by its unique persistent ID.
    int
    getBookingCountForSlot(int slotId)
    Counts the total number of CONFIRMED bookings for a specific slot.
    List<Booking>
    getBookingsBySlot(int slotId)
    Retrieves all bookings (across all users) for a specific time slot.
    List<Booking>

    Retrieves all bookings corresponding to a specific user.
    boolean
    updateBookingStatus(int bookingId, BookingStatus status)
    Updates the status of an existing booking (e.g., CONFIRMED to CANCELLED).

  • Method Details

    • addBooking

      int addBooking(Booking booking)
      Persists a new booking in the system.
      Parameters:
      booking - the Booking object to be added
      Returns:
      the auto-generated booking ID, or 0 if failed

    • getBookingById

      Booking getBookingById(int bookingId)
      Retrieves a booking by its unique persistent ID.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the unique booking ID
      Returns:
      the Booking object, or null if not found

    • getBookingsByUser

      List<Booking> getBookingsByUser(int userId)
      Retrieves all bookings corresponding to a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique user ID
      Returns:
      a list of all bookings for that user

    • getBookingsBySlot

      List<Booking> getBookingsBySlot(int slotId)
      Retrieves all bookings (across all users) for a specific time slot.
      Parameters:
      slotId - the unique slot ID
      Returns:
      a list of bookings for that slot

    • updateBookingStatus

      boolean updateBookingStatus(int bookingId, BookingStatus status)
      Updates the status of an existing booking (e.g., CONFIRMED to CANCELLED).
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the unique booking ID
      status - the new BookingStatus
      Returns:
      true if the status was successfully updated

    • deleteBooking

      boolean deleteBooking(int bookingId)
      Deletes a booking record from the system.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the unique booking ID
      Returns:
      true if deletion was successful

    • getBookingCountForSlot

      int getBookingCountForSlot(int slotId)
      Counts the total number of CONFIRMED bookings for a specific slot.
      Parameters:
      slotId - the unique slot ID
      Returns:
      the count of active bookings
